snippet: Investigators are still trying to solve the $81 million cyberheist from the central bank of Bangladesh in February.
abstract: Bank messaging network Swift warns that thieves have hacked into commercial bank and stolen money, in what seems to be widespread attack on global banking; theft of $81 million from central bank of Bangladesh in February shares many similarities to latest crime; some experts say attacks, which reveal sophisticated knowledge of operations within targeted banks, may be impossible to solve or trace.
lead_paragraph: Investigators are still trying to solve the $81 million cyberheist from the central bank of Bangladesh in February.

headline.main: Once Again, Thieves Enter Swift Financial Network and Steal
headline.print_headline: Global Network Exploited Again in a Bank Theft

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: SWIFT (Society for Worldwide Interbank Financial Telecommunication)
